game.name: Anseion - Fantasy MMORPG
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 앱 내 구매, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: Get ready for a journey to the world of Anseion, an immersive 2D MMORPG. Choose your faction: good or evil. Fight against players and monsters, explore the fascinating world, collect items and create your own. Make a unique character. Participate in events and faction battles, increase your rank.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get ready for a journey to the world of Anseion, an immersive 2D MMORPG. Choose your faction: good or evil. Fight against players and monsters, explore the fascinating world, collect items and create your own. Make a unique character. Participate in events and faction battles, increase your rank.
